BRK.name: Force an Interrupt
BRK.description: The BRK instruction forces the generation of an interrupt request. The program counter and processor status are pushed on the stack then the IRQ interrupt vector at $FFFE/F is loaded into the PC and the break flag in the status set to one.

NOP.name: No Operation
NOP.description: The NOP instruction causes no changes to the processor other than the normal incrementing of the program counter to the next instruction.

RTI.name: Return from Interrupt
RTI.description: The RTI instruction is used at the end of an interrupt processing routine. It pulls the processor flags from the stack followed by the program counter.
